name: Retro Alien Invasion
description:
Use arrow (or A and D) keys to set the angle. Shoot with space or mouse click.

Made for #LowRezJam. I don't remember the name of the original Atari game, I'm not even sure if such a game existed in Atari times.

Art & Code: Ahmet Kamil Keleş

Music: cinichecuk (performence of The Ride of the Valkyries)

SFX: Uğurcan Orçun
